name: Totally Not A Tower Defense
description:
Hello there! 

We are students of Joviat Manresa, in Catalonia, and we started making games in unity

We are learning yet, so, this is only a school project, but is one of our first games and we are soo proud of it!

It is made in Unity 2018.3.7f1 with our own 3D assets and other from the asset store.

Team:

- Ferran Clua Vila
- Ivan Fuentes Ginel
- Aaron Martínez Gimenez
- Antonio Prieto Vera

Edit: We detected that in some devices (OpenGL ES 3.0) cannot go through the level door, we are gonna fix that soon.
